Title: Untitled (Great Leap Forward banner)
Notes: A small banner from a set, celebrating the Great Leap Forward. The peasant on the right rushes towards the city (往城市) carrying foodstuffs (粮食) and industrial raw materials (工业原料), while a worker on the left rushes towards the countryside (往农村), balancing a smokestack with the legend "Go to the countryside to build a factory" (下乡建厂).
